traits.Low Cunning: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
traits.Overbearing Pack: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Raxivort's Tongue: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.
